response.original_title: Party Panda - The Birth of a Serial killer
response.overview: Miron, a socially awkward twenty-year college student whose best friend is a taxidermized dog, develops an unhealthy fixation for another student after a brief encounter. Imprisoned by his home life, caring for his dementia-riddled mother, he longs for acceptance. Instead, he finds only humiliation and physical abuse at the hands of the school bullies. After a sudden and traumatic accident leaves Miron alone, his world crumbles and a dark alter ego emerges from within. What begins as a chance encounter evolves into a gripping tale of vengeance and bloodshed, blurring the lines between reality and madness.
response.title: Party Panda - The Birth of a Serial killer
